valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 19 Dec 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Sat 20 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low 150 miles west of Bailey 966 moving steadily eastwards and losing its identity

Southeasterly veering southwesterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 at first.

Rough or very rough.
Weather
Rain then squally showers.

Good, occasionally poor.

Weather
In southeast, rain then showers. In northwest, showers, then rain later in west.

Moderate or poor.
